# 模式识别与机器学习中文版（马春鹏）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng
moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng
moshishibie-yu-jiqi-xuexi-zhongwenban-machunpeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
